moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d3: I dont like that move. it seems very passive for white.
moves.3... Nf6 4. Bg5 h6 5. Be3 d5: black is attacking the center (maybe too soon) because of White's passive way of play.
moves.6. d4: by that move white admit his mistake in the 3rd move.
moves.6... dxe4 7. Nxe5 Nd5: I think that better was: 7... Nxe5 8. dxe5 Qxd1  9. Kxd1 Ng4.
moves.8. Bc4 Be6: better was: 8... Nxe3 9. fxe3 Nxe5 10. dxe5 Qxd1  11. Kxd1 Bc5.
moves.9. Nc3 Nxe3 10. fxe3 Bb4: not the best move. like before - Nxe5.
moves.11. Bxe6 Nxe5 12. dxe5 fxe6: now black is left with an open king side and no defence to the poor king in the center.
moves.13. Qh5+ Kd7 14. O-O-O+: ! black must give up a piece.
moves.14... Bd6 15. Qf7+ Kc8 16. Qxe6+ Kb8: white is pushing black to the edge. the end is near...
moves.17. exd6 Re8: not good but what else can black do?
